Russia.full_name: Взрывоопасные среды. Часть 20-1. Характеристики веществ для классификации газов и паров. Методы испытаний и данные
Russia.notes: Original Russian standard for explosive atmospheres - material characteristics for gas and vapor classification

China.full_name: 爆炸性环境 第20-1部分：气体和蒸气分类用物质特性 试验方法和数据
China.notes: Chinese equivalent based on IEC/ISO standards, similar technical requirements for explosive atmospheres and material characteristics

Europe.full_name: Explosive atmospheres - Part 20-1: Material characteristics for gas and vapour classification - Test methods and data
Europe.notes: ГОСТ 31610.20-1-2020 is modified version of ISO/IEC 80079-20-1:2017 (equivalent to IEC 60079-20-1)

GOST_to_GB.notes: Both standards are based on similar IEC/ISO foundations with minor regional adaptations. Material classification methods and test procedures are highly compatible.

GOST_to_EN.notes: ГОСТ 31610.20-1-2020 is a modified version of IEC 60079-20-1, ensuring high compatibility with European EN IEC 60079-20-1 standard.

GB_to_EN.notes: Both GB/T 3836.20-1 and EN IEC 60079-20-1 are based on identical IEC international standards, ensuring full compatibility for material classification in explosive atmospheres.

recommendations: Ensure that all parties involved in the replacement are aware of the minor discrepancies in material properties and dimensional compatibility.
Conduct further verification of material properties before finalizing any replacements, especially for critical applications.
